code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:8000/api/banks';export const bankService={getAllBanks:async token=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/all"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;},getActiveBanks:async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/"));return response.data;},createBank:async(bankData,token)=>{const response=await axios.post(API_URL,bankData,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;},deleteBank:async(id,token)=>{await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});}};
